mapper.select: SELECT picture, M.car_name, M.model_name, price, zero_to_hundred, max_mileage, car_type, km_kwh, power_kw, amount FROM ElectricCar E JOIN Brands B ON E.brand_id = B.brand_id JOIN Model M ON E.car_id = M.car_id JOIN Performance P on M.model_id = P.model_id, Subsidy as S WHERE S.sigoongoo_id = 1 AND S.car_size = 1 AND E.car_type = 1 AND B.brand_id = 1 AND price BETWEEN 1000 AND 15000;
